text: Daniel I. Werfel (born 1971) is an American politician and businessman. He was the Commissioner of Internal Revenue from 2023 to 2025. He was formerly a Managing Director and Partner at Boston Consulting Group (BCG) from 2014 to 2023. ==References== Category:Commissioners of Internal Revenue Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:Politicians from Boston Category:Businesspeople from Boston Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Daniel Werfel
